body: @haitoku: I think the author didn't lie about having that title: MC netori (steals) his friend's GF (gyaru girl Rina, fuck yea Rina is my type of girl) and netorase (gets excited from cuckolding) his own GF to the friend. Even after reading part 2, the whole thing feels like the author just wanted to switch the couples and swap over those relationships for "better preferential sexual compatibilities" as the excuse. So there you go folks, enjoy!

Just as the title says, there is 'netori' and also 'netorase', aka 'heavy cuckolding' since the story involves swapping/swinging, all centered on cheating (characters lying). This series is artist cg format and there are some good scenes aside from the NTR focus.Here is part 1: https://hitomi.la/cg/ore-tachi-no-netori-netorase-swapping-seikatsu!-english-1693321.html **** and here is part 2: https://hitomi.la/cg/ore-tachi-no-netori-netorase-swapping-seikatsu2!-english-1702919.html **** Part 3 is also out but untranslated: https://hitomi.la/cg/%E4%BF%BA%E3%81%9F%E3%81%A1%E3%81%AE%E5%AF%9D%E5%8F%96%E3%82%8A%E5%AF%9D%E5%8F%96%E3%82%89%E3%81%9B%E3%82%B9%E3%83%AF%E3%83%83%E3%83%94%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0%E6%80%A7%E6%B4%BB3!-%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E8%AA%9E-1849742.html
